pullrequest.title: Fix for passing a composition into calculate_mass.

content.raw:
Thanks for participation, John.

*P.S. I was hoping to apply your fix to the `lev` branch alone (I try to only commit new versions to `default` for some vague reason), but this is not how my edit worked. Any idea how I could have done that?*
content.html:
Thanks for participation, John.

P.S. I was hoping to apply your fix to the lev branch alone (I try to only commit new versions to default for some vague reason), but this is not how my edit worked. Any idea how I could have done that?
